MV ARIETTA - 55,818 - 4 X 30 AND 4 X 12 CBM     KOHSICHANG,  30 AUG/1 SEP AGW
ROB: VLSFO ABT 875-925 MTS / LSMGO ABT 135-145 MTS
LAST 5 CARGOES: UREA/ALUMINA/DRY DOCK/SPODUMENE/ AUSSIE WHEAT/SBM
+
M/V 'ARIETTA' BUILT IHI AICHI SHIPYARD CHITA 2009
55,818 MT DWT ON 12.735 SSW, TPC 56.5, BC
VESSEL IS EQUIPPED WITH A DUAL LOADLINE OF ABOUT 49,999 MT ON 11.71M (THERE IS A COST TO MOVE SAME FROM NKK)
LIBERIAN FLAG
LOA/BEAM 190.0M/32.26M, MOULDED DEPTH 18.1M
5 HO/HA - HATCH 1 - 14.56 X 18.60M, HATCHES 2-5 - 20.93 X 18.6M
HYDRAULIC DOUBLE SKIN END FOLDING HATCH COVERS
GRAIN:  72,062.46 CUM, GT/NT 31,532/18,765
CR (IHI) 4 X 30 TONS/24 TONS IN GRABBING MODE, 26.0M OUTREACH (9.87M OVERSIDE) PLUS 4 X 12 CBM PEINER GRABS (ELECTRO HYDRAULIC) ADJUSTING DOWN TO 6.0 CBM, MAX DENSITY 2.5 MT/CBM
NO MORE THAN 1 CRANE TO BE WORKED AT A HATCH OR HOPPER
OWNERS WILL NOT SUPPLY CRANEMEN FROM THE CREW
CHARTERERS TO HAVE FREE USE OF VESSEL'S CRANES AND GRABS
SP/CON LADEN: ABOUT 13.25K ON ABOUT 31T VLSFO/BALLAST: ABOUT 13.5K ON ABOUT 30T VLSFO 380 RMG NMGOAS
ECO SPEED WOG ABOUT 13K ON ABOUT 23.0T VLSFO BALLAST/ABOUT 12.00K ON ABOUT 24.50T VLSFO LADEN
PORT CONSUMPTION - IDLE 2.2T VLSFO + 0.1T LSMGO, WORKING 5.0T VLSFO + 0.1 LSMGO
ALL DETAILS 'ABOUT'
Regards
Christian Friedrich
